summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an additional appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund for the completion of Construction and an appropriation and transfer of funds from the Arterial City Street Fund to the Park Acquisition and Development Fund as reimbursement of costs for the design of a traffic signal, all in connection with the Waterfront Street Improvement-Phases I and II Project; and authorizing an increase in an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
